response.overview: Red Bird is a haunting and poetic documentary about a man, Giulio Petrilli, who spent nearly a decade in prison without a single piece of concrete evidence ever proving his guilt. Through deeply personal interviews, surreal visual metaphors, and stylized artistic interludes, the film explores the emotional and psychological devastation wrought by wrongful incarceration, portraying a justice system where silence, prejudice, and bureaucracy conspire to erase a life
response.title: RED BIRD Giulio Petrilli Racconta
